item.description: I lead the multi-disciplinary Human Centred Technology Research Cluster at the University of Sydney, Australia. My research is in the areas of Artificial Intelligence in Education (AIED), Ubiquitous Computing (Ubicomp) and Human Computer Interaction (HCI). She leads the Human Centred Technology Research Cluster, a large multi-disciplinary group at the University of Sydney. A core focus of her research it to create system that harness personal data for personalisation with user control, based on creating systems and interfaces to enable people to scrutinize their own user model and the personalisation processes based on it.

item.title: Full Publication List
item.description: A full list of my publications can be found here.

item.title: Editorial and Research Leadership
item.description: Editor-in-chief (2012 -) IJAIED: International Journal of Artificial Intelligence in Education | publisher site | IAIED | Submissions and reviews | ERIC Editor (2018-2020) Interactive, Mobile, Wearable and Ubiquitous Technologies (IMWUT) | PCS submissions Editorial Board (2000 - ): User Modeling and User-Adapted Interaction: The Journal of Personalization Research (UMUAI) | submissions | SCImago HCI Associate Editor (2011 - ): ACM Transactions on Interactive Intelligent Systems (TiiS)

item.title: Students
item.description: Current research students: Augusto Dias Pereira dos Santos – Educational data mining Callum Parker – Designing for personalised interactive experiences at digital public displays Mike Seymour – Exploration of the next generation of human-computer interaction using interactive photo-realistic facial avatars. Lie Ming Tang – Lifelong user modelling for long term goals SooJeung Yoo - Augmented reality games for fun and health Alan Yung - Exploring support for oncologists with the data that drives decisions in diagnosis and treatments A full list of past students can be found here

item.title: Teaching
item.description: My 2019 teaching at at University of Sydney: DATA3506 - Human-in-the-loop data analytics (New in 2019) COMP5427 - Usability Engineering | CUSP COMP5047 - Pervasive Computing | CUSP
